comments: Fun class! We watched great movies and had a couple of easy projects. I got an A on my vampire trading cards. We didn\'t really discuss the movies like the other WCC film classes, but it was an enjoyable class especially durring the summer. 3 hours a weeks to just chill and watch a movie in an air conditioned, dark room! you do have to take notes...
Horror Film class is so easy and fun! All you do is watch movies day after day and write one page of notes.You have three projects which are the easiest projects ever.
